about_the_game:
This content pack adds unique abilities when playing as German.

Share your German traditions with your beer-loving neighbors. As a German outfit, you can brew large amounts of crisp German lager, and celebrate a Volksfest that will astound your neighborhood. If you can outproduce all the other brewers in town during Prohibition, a new legacy goal awaits as well.

Features:
  • Add German national colors and symbols to your safehouse, crew markers and other parts of the game
  • Brew German Lager in a new backroom operation
  • Celebrate a Volksfest as part of a unique mission
  • Add two new skills for your crew: Brewery Lover and German Efficiency allow you to cut costs and earn more
  • Unlock new clothing options and bring German fashion to your character portraits
  • Prosper through Prohibition with a new Legacy goal based on the amount of lager you brew

content_descriptors.notes: There are references to violence, crime, gambling, alcohol consumption and tobacco use.
